td6.view

Class CanvasFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • td6.view.CanvasFrame

  • public class CanvasFrame
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that allow for simple graphical drawing on a canvas.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.awt.Color BACKGROUND
      The canvas initial background color
      static int HEIGHT
      The canvas initial default height
      static int WIDTH
      The canvas initial default width

      • wait

        public void wait(int milliseconds)
        Wait for a specified number of milliseconds before finishing. This provides an easy way to specify a small delay which can be used when producing animations.
        Parameters:
        milliseconds - the delay to wait for in milliseconds
